Package net.sf.freecol.client.gui.action

Contains the Actions used by the GUI in menus and other places.

See: Description

Package net.sf.freecol.client.gui.action Description

Contains the Actions used by the GUI in menus and other places.

The actions are stored by the ActionManager and are all subclasses of FreeColAction.

If you implement a new action, you must also add a corresponding line to the ActionManager.initializeActions(InGameController,ConnectController) method. Each action is identified by a short ID, such as "quitAction". In order to provide localization, you must also add a line to the localization file "data/strings/FreeColMessages.properties" using the ID of the action plus ".name" as key.

You can also add a line with the ID of the action plus ".accelerator" in order to define a key binding. The value of the accelerator must be unique and must be valid Java KeyStroke Strings, as described here.
